1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Genus of contents.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Type.Genus
6  ( -- * Constructor
7    Genus (..),
8    genusVoid,
9    genusType, genusOf,
10    genusMember,
11    -- * Operator
12    genusMeet, genusDiff,
13    genusJoin, genusSplit,
14    genusInclude, genusExclude,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Data.Set                          as Set
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class        as D
20
21-- --------------------------------------------  Constructor
22
23-- | Set of various contents.
24--   A genus /C/ - /X/ + /Y/ has
25--   (1) /C/ is a set of types as representative contents,
26--   (2) /X/ is exclusive contents from the set, and
27--   (3) /Y/ is inclusive contents to the set.
28--
29--   Contents in /X/ must be in /C/,
30--   contents in /Y/ must not be in /C/.
31--   Internal function 'genusFrom' trims unnecessary contents
32--   according to this conditions.
33--
34--   Diagram of genus /G/ = /C/ - /X/ + /Y/:
35--
36--   > G -------$$$-$$$$$$------$-$$$-$$$$---------$--$----
37--   >             :             :   :             :  :
38--   > C    T1 |$$$$$$$$$$| T2 |$$$$$$$$$$|        :  :
39--   > X           x             x   x             :  :
40--   > Y                                           y  y
41--
42data Genus c = Genus
43    { genusTypes     :: Set.Set c  -- ^ Representative contents.
44    , genusExclusive :: Set.Set c  -- ^ Particular exclusive contents.
45    , genusInclusive :: Set.Set c  -- ^ Particular inclusive contents.
46    } deriving (Eq, Ord)
47
48instance (Show c) => Show (Genus c) where
49    show (Genus cs xs ys) = gen
50        where gen = "Genus " ++ s cs ++ xy " - " xs ++ xy " + " ys
51              s   = show . Set.elems
52              xy sign zs | Set.null zs = ""
53                         | otherwise   = sign ++ s zs
54
55-- | Create genus with trimming unnecessary contents.
56genusFrom :: (D.CTypeOf c) => Set.Set c -> Set.Set c -> Set.Set c -> Genus c
57genusFrom cs xs ys = Genus cs xs' ys' where
58    xs' = keepType cs xs  -- Keep related exclusives
59    ys' = omitType cs ys  -- Omit absorbed inclusives
60
61-- | Create genus of single type.
62genusType :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => c -> Genus c
63genusType c = genusFrom (Set.singleton c) Set.empty Set.empty
64
65-- | Create genus of single inclusives content.
66genusOf :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => c -> Genus c
67genusOf c = genusFrom Set.empty Set.empty (Set.singleton c)
68
69keepType :: (D.CTypeOf c) => O.Bin (Set.Set c)
70keepType ts = Set.filter p where
71    p c = D.typeOf c `Set.member` Set.map D.typeOf ts
72
73omitType :: (D.CTypeOf c) => O.Bin (Set.Set c)
74omitType ts = Set.filter p where
75    p c = D.typeOf c `Set.notMember` Set.map D.typeOf ts
76
77-- | Completely empty genus.
78genusVoid :: Genus c
79genusVoid = Genus Set.empty Set.empty Set.empty
80
81-- | Test membership of content to genus.
82genusMember :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => c -> Genus c -> Bool
83genusMember c (Genus ts xs ys)
84    | c `Set.member` xs  = False
85    | c `Set.member` ys  = True
86    | otherwise          = isAnyType c ts
87
88isAnyType :: (D.CTypeOf c) => c -> Set.Set c -> Bool
89isAnyType c ts = any (c `D.sameType`) ts
90
91
92-- --------------------------------------------  Operator
93
94-- | Meet of two genera.
95--
96--   Meet of /A/ - /X1/ + /Y1/
97--
98--   > -------$$-$$$$$$$------$-$$$$$-$$--------$---$-----------
99--   >          :              :     :          :   :
100--   > A  T1 |$$$$$$$$$$| T2 |$$$$$$$$$$|       :   :
101--   > X1       x1             x1    x1         :   :
102--   > Y1                                       y1  y1
103--
104--   and /B/ - /X2/ + /Y2/
105--
106--   > -------------$---------$$$$-$$$$$------$$-$$$$$$$---$----
107--   >              :             :             :          :
108--   > B            :     T2 |$$$$$$$$$$| T3 |$$$$$$$$$$|  :
109--   > X2           :             x2            x2         :
110--   > Y2           y2                                     y2
111--
112--   is:
113--
114--   > -------------$---------$-$$-$$-$$------------$-----------
115--   >              :          :  :  :              :
116--   > C            :     T2 |$$$$$$$$$$|           :
117--   > X3      (x1) :          x1 x2 x1        (x2) :
118--   > Y3           y2                              y1
119--   >         <A * Y2 - X1>                   <B * Y1 - X2>
120--
121genusMeet :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => O.Bin (Genus c)
122genusMeet (Genus a x1 y1) (Genus b x2 y2) = genusFrom c x3 y3 where
123    c  = Set.intersection a b
124    x3 = Set.union x1 x2
125    y3 = (keepType a y2 Set.\\ x1) `Set.union` (keepType b y1 Set.\\ x2)
126
127-- | Difference of two genera.
128--
129--   Difference of /A/ - /X1/ + /Y1/
130--
131--   > -------$$$-$$$$$$------$-$$$$$-$$--------$--$-----------$----
132--   >           :             :     :          :  :           :
133--   > A  T1 |$$$$$$$$$$| T2 |$$$$$$$$$$|       :  :           :
134--   > X1        x1            x1    x1         :  :           :
135--   > Y1                                       y1 y1          y1
136--
137--   and /B/ - /X2/ + /Y2/
138--
139--   > -------------$---------$$$$-$$$$$------$$-$$$$$$$---$--------
140--   >              :             :             :          :
141--   > B            :     T2 |$$$$$$$$$$| T3 |$$$$$$$$$$|  :
142--   > X2           :             x2            x2         :
143--   > Y2           y2                                     y2
144--
145--   is:
146--
147--   > -------$$$-$$-$$$----------$-------------$--------------$----
148--   >           :  :             :             :              :
149--   > C  T1 |$$$$$$$$$$|         :             :              :
150--   > X3        x1 y2       (x1) : (x1)        :         (y2) :
151--   > Y3                         x2            y1             y1
152--
153genusDiff :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => O.Bin (Genus c)
154genusDiff (Genus a x1 y1) (Genus b x2 y2) = genusFrom c x3 y3 where
155    c  = Set.difference a b
156    x3 = Set.union x1 y2
157    y3 = Set.union (omitType b y1) x2
158
159-- | Join of two genera.
160--
161--   Join of /A/ - /X1/ + /Y1/
162--
163--   > -------$$$-$$$$$$------$-$$$$-$$$--------$---------------
164--   >           :             :    :           :
165--   > A  T1 |$$$$$$$$$$| T2 |$$$$$$$$$$|       :
166--   > X1        x1            x1   x1          :
167--   > Y1                                       y1
168--
169--   and /B/ - /X2/ + /Y2/
170--
171--   > -------------$---------$-$$$$$$$$------$$-$$$$$$$---$----
172--   >              :          :                :          :
173--   > B            :     T2 |$$$$$$$$$$| T3 |$$$$$$$$$$|  :
174--   > X2           :          x2               x2         :
175--   > Y2           y2                                     y2
176--
177--   is:
178--
179--   > -------$$$-$$$$$$------$-$$$$$$$$------$$$$$$$$$$---$----
180--   >           :             :                           :
181--   > C  T1 |$$$$$$$$$$| T2 |$$$$$$$$$$| T3 |$$$$$$$$$$|  :
182--   > X3        x1            x1 = x2                     :
183--   >       <X1 - B - Y2>    <X1 * X2>      <X2 - A - Y1> :
184--   > Y3          (y2)                                    y2
185--
186genusJoin :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => O.Bin (Genus c)
187genusJoin (Genus a x1 y1) (Genus b x2 y2) = genusFrom c x3 y3 where
188    c       = Set.union a b
189    x3      = Set.unions [omitType b x1, Set.intersection x1 x2, omitType a x2]
190               `Set.difference` y3
191    y3      = Set.union y1 y2
192
193-- | Split acceptable genus by actual genus.
194genusSplit :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => Genus c -> Genus c -> (Genus c, Genus c)
195genusSplit p a = (genusMeet a p, genusDiff a p)
196
197-- | Include specific contents.
198genusInclude :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => Genus c -> [c] -> Genus c
199genusInclude g ys = g `genusJoin` Genus Set.empty Set.empty (Set.fromList ys)
200
201-- | Exclude specific contents.
202genusExclude :: (Ord c, D.CTypeOf c) => Genus c -> [c] -> Genus c
203genusExclude g xs = g `genusJoin` Genus Set.empty (Set.fromList xs) Set.empty
204
